summary: BUFF DOGE COIN - Launched in August 2021, Buff Doge Coin is the buff version of Doge. It features a popular dog head with a muscular human body that appears in numerous humorous memes. The world loves Buff Doge, and we are also the first cryptocurrency to have invented the Double Burn Protocol. From memes to a world-class cryptocurrency with utility, Buff Doge Coin has it all.
